Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- Created by Hein Ferman
29.03.2012 SH SCR17202 Added updated BADP_BPOR_ID = 0 if BADP_RESTITUTE is changed from Y to N, incl. deletion
of BPOR/BPOD row(s); Removed PI.BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR/PI.BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR (no longer modifiable)
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Removed public name
24.05.2011 SH SCR16478 Replaced gv.OPPOSITEEXCHGRATE
19.04.2011 JH SCR16375 Added GB406.PI.BANK_ADMNO
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ002 by the BMQ005
04.12.2008 SH SCR14179 Added GB406.PI.CLNT212_FCI
27.04.2007 SH SCR12484 Added BMQ002.PI.DATE = null
21.03.2006 SH SCR10673 Added GB406 to calc new BADP fields for diff. currencies
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments for BMQ002, both skipped
on 27.5.2005 WJ SCR8154 check if call BMQ002
21.03.2005 SH SCR7917 Extended updates of BADP_EXCHGRATE/TYPE
12.01.2004 SH SCR5161 Added new para PI.BADP_BANK_STORNO
11.06.2003 SH SCR3733 Added new para pi.BADP_UNALLOCATED_USER and
- new field BADP_UNALLOCATED_USER, init with new para
13.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Added two new parameters which have to be stored to BADP
- BADP_EXCHGRATE and BADP_EXCHGRATE_TYP
//23-10-2002 JP SCR #2388 add new param to call BMQ002
14.10.2002 SCR2341 Call BMQ002 always if OPH101C was called from OPH104 and
- BADP-ANNESXESTOSCAN = 'Y'
//11-10-2002 JP SCR #2339 add new param to call of BMQ002
25.09.2002 SH Switched parameters from Select virtual to Select parameter and
- added two new parameters PI.BADP_ADMOUNTHELLERCOSTACCCURR and
- PI.BADP_COST_NO
25.07.2002 SCR1746 SH Added new parameter "pi.Called from program". If parameter
- = 3 OPH101C was called from OPH104. If ANNEXES TO SCAN was selected for
- unallocated payments in OPH101C, if it was called from OPH104 and the
- BADP_HYPA_ID = 0 we have to prepare the scanning directly, get HYPA_ID with
- GB003, store thjis in BADP_HYPA_ID and store a message in MQ58 to handle the
- scanning later with OMQ058
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH add new field "BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER" to obtain table
- with primary key
23.05.2002 SH SCR1304 If BADP_ANNEXESTOSCAN = 'Y' then
- BADT_NUMBERANNEXESTOSCAN +1
-- ATTENTION: Table BADP open in WRITE-MODE
--Called From --> 1 = OPH101A, 2 = OPH101B, 3 = OPH104, 4 = OPH106C
-- Updates to BADT
-- Updates to BADP
-- Special updates of exchange rate/type
-- Set BADP_HYPA_ID only if it's zero and OPH101C was called from OPH104
-- (Unallocated payments), because otherwise it's not possible to prepare
-- scannings for unallocated payments, because OPH101B didn't called for
-- unallocated payments
-- Store a row in MQ58 to handle the scanning later with OMQ058
